title: Quarterly average daily rate of hotels in New York 2016 to 2017
summary: This grouped bar chart shows Average daily rate in USD on the Y-axis for 4 different Quarters for 2 groups 2016, and 2017 that are presented on the X-axis.
Over the 4 Quarters, the Average daily rate in USD for 2017 have been grew whereas lowered for 2016.
Quarter Q4 had the maximum Average daily rate in USD among all 2 groups, and it was for 2016. The minimum Average daily rate in USD was observed in Quarter Q4 for 2017.
Among all the Quarters, 2017 had the highest Average daily rate in USD 257.0 in Quarter Q1 and lowest value 0.0 in Quarter Q4.
min_summary: This grouped bar chart shows Average daily rate in USD on the Y-axis for 4 different Quarters for 2 groups 2016, and 2017 that are presented on the X-axis.
All through the Quarters, the Average daily rate in USD for 2017 have grew. On the other hand, for 2016 the Average daily rate in USD have lowered.
mid_summary: This grouped bar chart shows Average daily rate in USD on the Y-axis for 4 different Quarters for 2 groups 2016, and 2017 that are presented on the X-axis.
Over the 4 Quarters, the Average daily rate in USD for 2017 have been grew whereas lowered for 2016.
Quarter Q4 had the maximum Average daily rate in USD among all 2 groups, and it was for 2016. The minimum Average daily rate in USD was observed in Quarter Q4 for 2017.
Among all the Quarters, 2017 had the highest Average daily rate in USD 257.0 in Quarter Q1 and lowest value 0.0 in Quarter Q4.
max_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 4 different Quarters on X-axis for 2 groups 2016, and 2017. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Average daily rate in USD.
Over the 4 Quarters, the Average daily rate in USD for 2017 have been grew whereas lowered for 2016.
In Quarter Q4, 2016 had the highest Average daily rate in USD 389.0 among the 2 groups and in Q4, 2017 had the lowest Average daily rate in USD 0.0.
In Quarter Q1, 2017 had the highest Average daily rate in USD among all 4 Quarters and it has the lowest Average daily rate in USD in Quarter Q4.
There is a gap of 257.0 between the highest and lowest Average daily rate in USD found for 2017 in Quarter Q1 and Q4.
Out of all 2 groups, the highest gap between the maximum and minimum Average daily rate in USD was found in case of 2016.
On average, the Quarter Q1 had the highest Average daily rate in USD for all 2 groups 2016, and 2017. Whereas Q3 had the lowest average Average daily rate in USD.
